message_system

Class OrganizerMessageController

  • java.lang.Object
    • message_system.AttendeeMessageController
      • message_system.OrganizerMessageController

  • public class OrganizerMessageController
extends AttendeeMessageController
    Controller class. A subclass of the AttendeeMessageController. Similar in functionality to AttendeeMessageController only it supports messaging all users in an event.

        inpUser - the current user logged in

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        This method is to be called immediately after OrganizerMessageController is instantiated. Prompts the user with different options for interaction with the message system. Includes the message to all Speakers and message to all Attendees functionality. Serializes the ConversationManager to cm.ser.
        Overrides:
        run in class AttendeeMessageController

      • handleMessageAllAttendees

        public void handleMessageAllAttendees()
        Helper method for this class's run() method. Handles messaging all attendees.

      • handleMessageAllSpeakers

        public void handleMessageAllSpeakers()
        Helper method for this class's run() method. Handles messaging all speakers.

      • serializeCM

        private void serializeCM()
